thread.title: Man dead after car hits lamppost in Shipley
thread.title_full: Man dead after car hits lamppost in Shipley | Calendar - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Man dead after car hits lamppost in Shipley
text:
The incident happened outside Ashfield Court Credit: Google Streetview A man has been arrested after a passenger in the car he was driving died when it hit a tree and a lamppost.
The 24-year-old, from Bradford, is being questioned on suspicion of causing death by dangerous driving following the incident in Bingley.
Police were called to Bradford Road shortly after 4am today and found a blue Audi RS4 had come off the road an collided with a tree and a lamppost outside Ashfield Court.
The passenger, a 22-year-old man from Bradford, was pronounced dead at the scene by paramedics.
The 24-year-old was treated at hospital for minor injuries before his arrest.
The road was closed for investigations but reopened at around 12.30pm.
Last updated Sun 26 Feb 2017 Bradford
